name: Eyes of Libaration
description:
W/A/S/D To Move  + Space to Jump + Left Mouse Button to Shot. When you pick up a dice you get a new weapon and heal yourself. 

Do to technical issues i could load it up in Time but you can play it here. 

Eyes of Libaration is a 2D Plattformer Shooter with a pretty wierd story. Made for the GMTK2022 Jam.

Have fun and give me a comment,

Programming , Art , Design ,: Philip Nuss.

Weapon Design : Daniel.
